movies.title: The Avengers
movies.desc: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender
movies.desc: In a war-torn world of elemental magic, a young boy reawakens to undertake a dangerous mystic quest to fulfill his destiny as the Avatar, and bring peace to the world.

movies.title: The Iron Giant
movies.desc: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.

movies.title: Mulan
movies.desc: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

movies.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
movies.desc: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

movies.title: Inception
movies.desc: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O., but his tragic past may doom the project and his team to disaster.
